name: Laser Eyes (kitoss, zooky12)
description:
You have the best superpower in the world, laser eyes! But there's a problem, it only activates every time you take five steps.

A  puzzle game made in 1 week for the Weekly Game Jam 205.

Controls:

  • Movement: W/A/S/D
  • Restart: R
  • Pause: Escape

Made by:

  • Arnau Albertí Serra - zooky12
  • Marc González Estrada - kitoss
